snippet: As the voting proceeded relatively smoothly in the presidential election, a real chance emerged that a candidate accused of crimes against humanity could win the race.
abstract: Millions of Kenyans pour into polling station to cast their ballots in crucial, anxiously awaited presidential election; Uhuru Kenyatta, who has been charged by International Criminal Court with war crimes against humanity, holds commanding lead over Prime Min Raila Odinga.
lead_paragraph: As the voting proceeded relatively smoothly in the presidential election, a real chance emerged that a candidate accused of crimes against humanity could win the race.

headline.main: Kenyans Flood Polls for Presidential Vote
headline.print_headline: Kenyans Flood Polls For Presidential Vote

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
